channel.title: Other macro programs?
channel.description: are there other macro programs like scar? plz send their names here :)

item.title: Other macro programs?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:

Well i know you hate KYAB Freddy. But i am not so sure to what it does. But it is said to be very good.
[/quote]

By retards.[/quote]
Nice

Read full topic

item.title: Other macro programs?
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:12, topic:141325”][quote author=IP-Drowner link=topic=193544.msg2100494#msg2100494 date=1205145403]

if there are other macro programs they usually get u banned within a few hours

And what are you basing that on?

Such as some auto-fighting programs probably?

But there is a java program called KYAB i think that is separate from SCAR but there is also a version that can be attached and used in SCAR. Now i am not quite sure, but it is meant to have perfect map walking.
[/quote]
Lol you took 5 months to answer that?[/quote]
Really? Oops, sorry. Usually i am linked to the topics at the top of the page so i think they’re up-to-date.

Read full topic

But there is a java program called KYAB i think that is separate from SCAR but there is also a version that can be attached and used in SCAR. Now i am not quite sure, but it is meant to have perfect map walking.[/quote]

item.title: Other macro programs?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The Un-Named:

It’s just me, but IBot has always been slower/less reliable than SCAR, but then that’s an issue with scripts.

I think the location detection is really great in ibot.

Read full topic

item.title: Other macro programs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:6, topic:141325”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=193544.msg1739870#msg1739870 date=1189271635]
Or they aren’t as good.

The problem with other colour clickers, is their bitmap functions will be VERY limited, slow and probably won’t work on large bitmaps.
[/quote]

I find ibot is much more versatile than scar. Maybe that’s just because I can’t see the script.[/quote]

It’s just me, but IBot has always been slower/less reliable than SCAR, but then that’s an issue with scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: Other macro programs?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

there is ibot/nexus over at www.rscheata.net
if you go over there you will find info on other bots as well such as ares.

I dont know much at all about the bots there but thats where i know there are other bots. (paybots).

Also www.rs-resources.com had a bot called arga but i’m not sure what going on with it.

Read full topic
